# The `Reader` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class can be used to read a Symtab and Strtab produced by <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/irsymtab/#a8af0e7caf92ff2e049dc40eceafc15be">irsymtab::build</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::irsymtab::Reader</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class can be used to read a Symtab and Strtab produced by <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/irsymtab/#a8af0e7caf92ff2e049dc40eceafc15be">irsymtab::build</a>.

### module&#95;symbols() {#a04409736e8ac494863b8d99d527923e1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Reader::symbol&#95;range llvm::irsymtab::Reader::module&#95;symbols (unsigned I) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns a slice of the symbol table for the I&#39;th module in the file.

The symbols enumerated by this method are ephemeral, but they can be copied into an <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsymtab/symbol">irsymtab::Symbol</a> object.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/irsymtab-h/#l00280">280</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/irsymtab-h">IRSymtab.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### symbols() {#a583e69face84cad10651476ced420ebd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Reader::symbol&#95;range llvm::irsymtab::Reader::symbols () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns the symbol table for the entire bitcode file.

The symbols enumerated by this method are ephemeral, but they can be copied into an <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsymtab/symbol">irsymtab::Symbol</a> object.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/irsymtab-h/#l00273">273</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/irsymtab-h">IRSymtab.h</a>.
